snippet: Mohammed Darrar Jammo, a prominent Syrian commentator and staunch defender of the government of President Bashar al-Assad, was gunned down Wednesday at his home.
abstract: Unidentified men fatally shoot Mohammed Darrar Jammo, prominent Syrian commentator and staunch defender of government of Pres Bashar al-Assad, outside his home in southern Lebanon.

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and HWAIDA SAAD
byline.contributor: Sebnem Arsu contributed reporting from Istanbul, Hania Mourtada from Beirut and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: Mohammed Darrar Jammo, a prominent Syrian commentator and staunch defender of the government of President Bashar al-Assad, was gunned down Wednesday at his home.

headline.main: Prominent Supporter of Assad Government Is Killed in Southern Lebanon
headline.print_headline: Prominent Supporter of Assad Government Is Killed in Southern Lebanon

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
